analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇe cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṁ nikkhipanto,
analyzed: saṅghāṭi kaṇṇe ce pi bhikkhave bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ anubandhaḥ assa pāde pādam nikkhipantaḥ

original: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo;
analyzed: saḥ ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibba sārāgaḥ byāpanna cittaḥ paduṭṭha mana saṅkappaḥ muṭṭha sati asampajānaḥ asamāhitaḥ vibbhanta cittaḥ pāka tindriyaḥ

original: atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ aham ca tassa

original: Dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati.
analyzed: dhamman hi saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu na passati
dhammaṃ a passantaḥ na mamam passati

original: Yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya.
analyzed: yojana sate ca ipi saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya

original: So ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto apaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo;
analyzed: so ca hoti kāmesu na tibba sārāgaḥ a byāpanna cittaḥ apaduṭṭha mana saṅkappaḥ upaṭṭhita sati sampajānaḥ samāhitaḥ ekagga cittaḥ savuti indriyo

original: atha kho so santikeva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ santikā iva mayha aham ca tassa
dhamman hi saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu passati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
